title: Boston Dynamics shows Atlas humanoid working at Georgia Hyundai plant
description:
In a 60 Minutes segment, Boston Dynamics provided a glimpse at how its Atlas humanoid is becoming more capable.

The post Boston Dynamics shows Atlas humanoid working at Georgia Hyundai plant appeared first on The Robot Report.
